text: @realDonaldTrump @JHoganGidley So since @kayleighmcenany left @TeamTrump to become a lying @PressSec on April 7, the campaign hasn’t had a press secretary & it has shown though I don’t think Hogan will improve things much with @parscale @TimMurtaugh Trump & others saying stupid things https://t.co/jsqK5RI4DQ
